Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1991
Subject: Retirement
Hi Chief,
I think my time is running out. This will be
my last season as a professional ballplayer.

Sincerely,
Gary Matthews Sr.



Date: Wednesday, 4/16/1991
Subject: Chipper Jones learns new position
Chipper Jones has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would rate his skills as "D" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Scott Coolbaugh
Dear Sir,
Scott Coolbaugh has an AVG of .225 at AA Williamsport Bills!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Felipe Lira
Dear Sir,
Felipe Lira is doing pretty good at A St. Lucie Mets!
He has an ERA of 2.68, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/3/1991
Subject: Progress of Herbert Perry
Dear Sir,
Herbert Perry is hitting the ball well at A St. Lucie Mets!
He has an AVG of .278, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
